name: Gift Shop
villain:
*lets out a continuous cry*. 
You are quickly surrounded by other balloon animals and they grab you. 
You start to float away never to be seen again. Game Over.
Quickly you prick the Balloon Dog with a needle, and it drops a silver key.
unReachableDirection: A pile of bobble heads are in your way. Please choose another direction.

name: Cotton Candy Stand
villain:
The Cotton Candy Monster did not like that. 
The Monster grabs you and spins you in the cotton candy machine. 
You are now a Cotton Candy Monster. Game Over.

The Cotton Candy Monster shrivels up and deteriorates into a pink goo. 
Within the goo there is a gold key.
unReachableDirection: A pile of paper cones are in your way. Please choose another direction.

name: Safe Area
unReachableDirection: A pile of peanuts are in your way. Please choose another direction.

name: Popcorn Stand
villain:
The Popcorn Snake is not fazed by your actions. 
It completely wraps around you, and drags you into the popcorn machine. 
You are now a popcorn snake. Game Over.

You grab the broom, sweep up the Popcorn Snake into the trash and tie it up. 
It leaves behind a bronze key.
unReachableDirection: A pile of paper bags filled with popcorn kernels are in your way. Please choose another direction.

name: Hot Dog Stand
unReachableDirection: A pile of mustard bottles are in your way. Please choose another direction.

name: Dreamland Gate
unReachableDirection: A wrought iron fence is in your way. Please choose another direction.
